participant_1.background:

I'm doing okay in school, though I'm a bit worried about my upcoming exams.

i hate popcorn.

participant_2.background:
My job is secure and I get paid well.
i have two kids.
I like to create my own clothes because it allows me to express myself and be unique.
my favorite tv show is rick and morty.
i collect dolls.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am just a bit anxious about my upcoming exams.
I understand that, exams can be stressful. But I am sure you will do great!
Thank you, I hope so! What do you do for a living?
I am a designer, and I love it! I get to use my creativity and technical skills every day.
That sounds amazing! I would love to have a job like that.
It is definitely rewarding. I get to see my designs come to life, and it is really satisfying.
That's great! I am glad that you have found a job that you love.
Thank you! Me too! What are your hobbies?
I enjoy cooking, and I am learning how to make Thai food.
That's awesome! I love to cook as well. I like to create my own clothes, it allows me to express myself and be unique.
That sounds like a really fun hobby! I love Rick and Morty, what is your favorite episode?
My favorite episode is the one where they go to the Citadel. I love all the different Ricks and Mortys.
That is a great episode! I love how they all have different personalities.
Me too! What do you like to collect?
I collect dolls, I love the different styles and designs.
That's cool! I have never collected anything before.
It's a lot of fun, and it's nice to have something to show off.
I can imagine. It sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies!
I do, I am glad that I have found things that I enjoy doing.
Me too! I think it's important to have hobbies that you love.
I agree! It makes life more enjoyable.
